title: Bat Scepter
summaries: The Bat Scepter is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that auto-fires (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1–3 / (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 2–3 homing bat projectiles per shot. These projectiles will not ricochet off of blocks but dissipate upon contact with an enemy or block instead, unlike the Bee Gun or Wasp Gun. The Bat Scepter is dropped by the Pumpking during the Pumpkin Moon event with a 1.56–12.5% (6.25–12.5%) chance depending on the current wave.

statistics.Mana: 6 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 3 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Tooltip: Summons bats to attack your enemies
statistics.Sell: 10 GC
